metadata.title: CVE-2024-35898 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: Fix potential data-race in __nft_flowtable_type_get()nft_unregister_flowtable_type() within nf_flow_inet_module_exit() canconcurrent with __nft_flowtable_type_get() within nf_tables_newflowtable().And thhere is not any protection when iterate over nf_tables_flowtableslist in __nft_flowtable_type_get(). Therefore, there is pertentialdata-race of nf_tables_flowtables list entry. Use list_for_each_entry_rcu()to iterate over nf_tables_flowtables list in __nft_flowtable_type_get(),and use rcu_read_lock() in the caller nft_flowtable_type_get() to protectthe entire type query process.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
